items.sentence: Don't you think you're being a little bit dramatic?
Tomorrow I'm going to meet my girlfriend's parents.
When's the next meeting? I hope it's not on Monday.
I've been as busy as a bee for the past two months.
I couldn't understand what the president said then.
I enjoyed myself very much at the party last night.
I took the 10:30 train, which was ten minutes late.
I agree with your interpretation to a large extent.
I had never received such an abusive letter before.
I felt somebody patting on my shoulder from behind.
